name: MoPub-Pangle-Adapters
summary: Pangle adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Interstitial, Rewarded Video, Native.

To download and integrate the Pangle SDK, please check this tutorial: https://partner.oceanengine.com/union/media/union/download/detail?id=2&osType=ios.


For inquiries and support, please utilize the developer support forum: https://partner.oceanengine.com/faq?union=true.
